dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Yoshua Bengio
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: MNIST is a benchmark image classification database consisting of 60,000 training samples and 10,000 test samples of 28x28 gray-scale images representing digits ranging from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: S. A. Nene
S. K. Nayar
H. Murase
dcterms:description: COIL-20 dataset contains color images for 20 classes of objects, with 1440 observations in total, where 1100 samples are used for training and 300 samples for testing.
dcterms:title: COIL-20

dcterms:creator: S. A. Nene
S. K. Nayar
H. Murase
dcterms:description: COIL-100 dataset is an extended version of COIL-20, containing 7000 color images for 100 classes of objects, with 5000 samples used for training and 2000 for testing.
dcterms:title: COIL-100
